title: The Accidental Bride
description: Now living together, Lizzie and John enjoy a state of blissfully uncomplicated pleasure - and an increasingly tumultuous sex life.But when an old flame from John's past turns up unannounced, his and Lizzie's relationship is suddenly thrown into question.Despite his marriage proposal, it is difficult to tell where John's heart really lies. Lizzie accidentally fell in love - will it be just as easy to accidentally lose him?
author: Portia Da Costa
